Description:
Major musical influences:
Machine Head, Iron Maiden, Dio, Metallica, Pantera

Favourite Powerwolf song: Glaubenskraft Favourite Music (current top 5): Machine Head - Bloodstone & Diamonds Mustasch – Thank you for the deamon The Melvins – Houdini Soen – Lotus Katatonia – Night is the New Day First record bought: Scorpions – Lonesome crow Latest record bought Alien Weapony - Tangaroa Best concert ever seen: Soen – Summer Breeze Festival 2019 Best Powerwolf Show: we had a lot of great shows, i will never forget the Headliner Show at Bang your Head Festival 2018 *mindblowing* Favourite movie director: The Coen Brothers Favourite movie: Fargo, The Big Lebowski, Interstellar Favourite series : omg there are too many:Breaking Bad, Dexter, The Walking dead, Shameless, Ozark, The Witcher and many more… Favourite game: Stronghold Crusade (Old School), Dishonored, Deus EX Human Revolution, Need For Speed Favourite actor : Christopher Walken Recommendable books: Lord of the Rings

Best Powerwolf Show:
Hard to choose among so many awesome memories, but Wacken 2019 was priceless.
